conditions: Soft Tissue Sarcomas, Thyroid Cancer, Lung Cancer, Indolent Lymphoma, Neuroendocrine Tumors, GIST, Uterine Malignancies, Carcinoma, Hepatocellular, Carcinoma, Lobular, Teratoma
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Uptake of C11-Acetate and F18-FDG in tumor will be measured in SUV PET units
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* patients with newly diagnosed tumors, which are often non-FDG avid or show only low intensity uptake:

  * Soft tissue sarcomas
  * well-differentiated thyroid cancer
  * well-differentiated and bronchoalveolar lung cancer
  * indolent lymphomas
  * neuroendocrine tumors
  * GIST
  * uterine malignancies
  * mucin-producing cancer
  * teratoma
  * hepatoma
  * HCC
  * lobular breast carcinoma
* Patients over the age of 18

Exclusion Criteria:

* patients under the age of 18 years
* pregnant and lactating women
* claustrophobic patients
